FuncDef:
The remote-backup-profile bas-multicast command binds a remote backup profile (RBP) to an interface on a vBRAS-UP.
The undo remote-backup-profile bas-multicast command unbinds an RBP from an interface on a vBRAS-UP.
By default, no RBP is bound to an interface on a vBRAS-UP.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an RBP.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a multicast UP dual-device hot backup scenario, an RBP must be configured. After an RBP is created, you must bind the RBP to an interface so that the RBP is applied to the interface. To bind an RBP to an interface, run the remote-backup-profile bas-multicast command.
Prerequisites
The UP mode of a device has been enabled using the cu-agent command in the system view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
